DataElement.preferredName: Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Bone Joint Condition Worse Activity Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether or not an individual experiences worsening of a bone or joint condition with physical activity as described in the Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire (PAR-Q).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Bone Joint Condition Worse Activity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The experience of worsening a bone or joint condition with physical activity as described in the Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm):No value exists.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: Bone; a rigid connective tissue that makes up the skeleton of vertebrates.:The point of connection between two bones or elements of a skeleton, especially if the articulation allows motion.:A state of being, such as a state of health or physical being.:In an declined condition.:The state of being active; any specific activity.

Concepts.definition: The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.
The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable.
A state of being, such as a state of health.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Modified to facilitate reuse by C3D adopters.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether or not an individual is ready for physical activity as described by the Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
